feed.title: Immich-Frame Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Immich-Frame: v1.0.24.0
entry.content:
ðŸ“¦ ImmichFrame Release v1.0.24.0 â€“ April 23, 2025

Client Repositories Split

The Android, Screensaver, and Desktop apps have been moved to their own dedicated repositories:

  • ImmichFrame Android
  • ImmichFrame Screensaver
  • ImmichFrame Desktop

What's Changed

âœ¨ New Features

  • Feat: Add custom CSS id's for image info by @3rob3 in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/289
  • Feat: Improve responsiveness when user manually requests prev/next image by @jwlarocque in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/288
  • Feat: Cache weather information. by @glogiotatidis in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/296
  • Feat: Add version, version logging, and version endpoint by @3rob3 in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/306
  • Feat: Rating (Stars) Filter by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/308
  • Feat: Pre-fetch and cache images by @jwlarocque in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/297
  • Feat: isArchived setting and implementation by @3rob3 in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/312

âš¡ Fixes

  • Fix: Height on mobile devices by switching from h-screen to h-dvh by @jwlarocque in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/287
  • Fix: Add animation fill on image zoom by @jwlarocque in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/293

New Contributors

  • @jwlarocque made their first contribution in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/287
  • @glogiotatidis made their first contribution in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/296

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/compare/v1.0.23.0...v1.0.24.0

entry.title: New release for Immich-Frame: v1.0.25.0
entry.content:
ðŸ“¦ ImmichFrame Release v1.0.25.0 â€“ May 08, 2025

Documentation

The new documentation page is now live, visit immichframe.online

What's Changed

âœ¨ New Features

  • Feat: ASCII-Art by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/321
  • Feat: Rework Backend, decouple by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/317
  • Feat: ImageFill by @3rob3 in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/333
  • Feat: Fetch asset metadata for images without people by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/339

âš¡ Fixes

  • Fix: Add text shadow to weather data display by @enumura1 in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/323
  • Fix: Description for memory assets (x years ago) by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/338
  • Fix: Logo flickering by @3rob3 in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/342

ðŸ““ Documentation

  • Docs: Basic documentation Page by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/325
  • Docs: Update documentation and index page by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/331
  • Docs: Update README and link to new documentation by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/332

ðŸ”¨ Maintenance

  • Chore: Image component code cleanup by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/334

New Contributors

  • @enumura1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/323

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/compare/v1.0.24.0...v1.0.25.0

entry.title: New release for Immich-Frame: v1.0.26.0
entry.content:
ðŸ“¦ ImmichFrame Release v1.0.26.0 â€“ May 22, 2025

More information overlay

Assetinfo icons and album names

What's Changed

âœ¨ New Features

  • Feat: Image Rework by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/344
  • Feat: Display album names by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/354
  • Feat: Option to set log level by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/357
  • Feat: Display more details by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/356

âš¡ Fixes

  • Fix: Clock update by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/350

ðŸ”¨ Maintenance

  • Chore: immich API update by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/365

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/compare/v1.0.25.0...v1.0.26.0
